posts.text: I think it was cool that we met all our objectives this week
I liked that our PM was super cool
Actually,let me tell you something...our designer...Jason? Yeah him...he's super awesome!

I don't like that the client made me pay for my uber...wtf
When I showed up at the client's office, they asked me who I was and when I told them they didn't believe me and kicked me out of the building...:(
